metadata.title: The Enchanted Garden
metadata.author: Tree Doc Examples
metadata.description: A short branching story about an enchanted garden.

nodes.content: You discover a hidden gate in the garden wall. Ivy curls around iron bars.
You push the gate open and step inside. A fountain glistens at the center.
You climb the wall instead. From the top, you see the entire garden laid out below.
You approach the fountain. A coin glints at the bottom of the clear water.
You wander the garden paths. Flowers you've never seen bloom in impossible colors.
You toss a coin into the fountain and make a wish. The water shimmers.
The garden seems to respond to your presence. You feel at peace.
